assessment_item.title: ‘ಪಾಕ್ ಆಕ್ರಮಿತ ಪ್ರದೇಶ’ ಎಂದು ಈಗಲೂ ಕರೆಯಲ್ಪಡುವ ಪ್ರದೇಶ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

‘ಪಾಕ್ ಆಕ್ರಮಿತ ಪ್ರದೇಶ’ ಎಂದು ಈಗಲೂ ಕರೆಯಲ್ಪಡುವ ಪ್ರದೇಶ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ಈಶಾನ್ಯ ಭಾಗ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4996"},{"text":"

ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ಆಗ್ನೇಯ ಭಾಗ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4997"},{"text":"

ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ವಾಯುವ್ಯ ಭಾಗ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:5007"},{"text":"

ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರದ ನೈರುತ್ಯ ಭಾಗ
